title: Pixie v1.0.7 - PXE Network Boot VirtualBox Appliance
description:
Instructions

1. Install VirtualBox appliance on the network you wish to enable PXE network boot on. Make sure the VM network type is bridged. Network must provide DHCP (usually this is done by a router)

2. On client machine, enable Network Boot ROM and set boot priority to Network/PXE.

3. Connect client machine to network and reboot. PXE boot menu should load.


Software bundle (all bootable from network):
HWiNFO v5.5.2
MemTest86+ v4.20
Parted Magic 2012_11_30
Windows XP SP3 Unattended Setup
Windows XP SP3 Unattended Setup (with DriverPacks)
Windows XP SP3 Unattended Setup (for Internet)
